translations: n.迭代；（计算机）新版软件；重申，复述；反复演算

sentences.sentence: This leads to continuous requirements change from iteration to iteration.
sentences.translation: 这导致从迭代到迭代的持续的需求变更。

sentences.sentence: In this strategy, people accept that their team members will have idle time during each iteration.
sentences.translation: 在此策略中，人们接受他们的团队成员将在每次迭代中有空闲时间。

sentences.sentence: At the end of an iteration of work, we always look back at how we did and figure out what we can do differently next time to improve.
sentences.translation: 持续的反馈和改进：在重复工作的结束时，我们总是回顾我们是如何做的，并找出下次改进时我们可以做的不同之处。
